title: I just got a 10 game chat restriction... :(

replies.body: Can't say. I there are no logs.

With a name like that, that's probably why... JK

Anyway you were probably x9 every game cause of the name and you showed any slight negativity in the chat, like report,ez,bad woosh, even if you had friendly conversations 1 bad quote, loose word in there and it destroys you.
Yes, RIOT ban my boards but let someone put something like this up. WOW
